prompt:
On a dark winter night, wealthy and enigmatic Mr. John Q. Boddy hosted a small, but lavish, dinner party for some of his closest associates. However, the night ended in tragedy when Mr. Boddy was found dead in one of the rooms of Tudor Mansion in the early hours of the morning. The following persons of interest have been identified as suspects:

• Mr. Green
• Professor Plum
• Miss Scarlet
• Miss Peach
• Mrs. White
• Colonel Mustard
• Sgt. Gray

And the following weapons were found on the premises:

• Lead Pipe
• Revolver
• Wrench
• Candlestick
• Horseshoe
• Knife

The murder could only have occured in one of the following rooms:

1. Kitchen
2. Library
3. Cloak Room
4. Gazebo
5. Fountain
6. Drawing Room
7. Billiard Room
8. Trophy Room
9. Carriage House

The rooms are laid out as follows:

  N N N  
W 1|2|3 E
W 4|5|6 E
W 7|8|9 E
  S S S  

The exact time of the murder is a bit uncertain, but it has been narrowed down to one of the following times:

• 11:30 PM
• 12:00 AM

At every time the suspects and Mr. Boddy either stayed in their current room or moved to an orthogonally adjacent room (north, south, east, or west). Weapons could be moved by suspects between rooms as well.

Each suspect uniquely had one of the following possible motives for killing Mr. Boddy:

• Power
• Revenge
• Anger
• Hatred
• Fear
• Jealousy
• Ambition

For the murder to occur, the murderer and Mr. Boddy must have been alone in a room with at least one weapon at some point in the night. Any clue about Mr. Boddy's whereabouts should be read as "Mr. Boddy (dead or alive) ..."

The available clues are as follows:

- The Horseshoe was in the Gazebo at 12:00 AM if and only if the Knife was in the Kitchen at 11:30 PM
- The murderer was in the Drawing Room at 12:00 AM if and only if Mr. Green was in the Library at 12:00 AM
- Professor Plum was in the Kitchen at 12:00 AM
- Mr. Green was in the Gazebo at 12:00 AM if and only if the Horseshoe was in the Gazebo at 11:30 PM
- The suspect motivated by Ambition was in the Kitchen at 11:30 PM
- The Revolver was in the room just east of the Knife at 11:30 PM
- The suspect motivated by Revenge was in the Trophy Room at 11:30 PM
- The Lead Pipe was in the room just south of Mrs. White at 11:30 PM
- The Horseshoe was in the same room as Mrs. White at 12:00 AM
- Professor Plum was in the same room as Colonel Mustard at 11:30 PM
- Miss Peach was in the Cloak Room at 11:30 PM
- The Candlestick was in the same room as the Wrench at 11:30 PM
- The suspect motivated by Jealousy was in the Trophy Room at 12:00 AM
- The Lead Pipe was in the Trophy Room at 12:00 AM
- Colonel Mustard was in the room just west of the Revolver at 12:00 AM
- The Knife was in the Drawing Room at 12:00 AM if and only if the murderer was at the Fountain at 11:30 PM
- The murderer was in the Gazebo at 12:00 AM if and only if the murder weapon was in the Gazebo at 11:30 PM
- The suspect motivated by Anger was in the Gazebo at 11:30 PM
- The suspect motivated by Revenge was in the same room as the Lead Pipe at 12:00 AM
- Colonel Mustard is motivated by Power
- The suspect motivated by Fear was in the Cloak Room at 12:00 AM if and only if the Horseshoe was in the Gazebo at 12:00 AM
- Sgt. Gray was in the same room as Miss Scarlet at 11:30 PM
- Mr. Green was in the Gazebo at 12:00 AM or Sgt. Gray was at the Fountain at 11:30 PM
- The Candlestick was in the Billiard Room at 12:00 AM
- Miss Scarlet is motivated by Jealousy

Please answer the following question(s):

A. Who murdered Mr. Boddy?
B. What weapon did the murderer use?
C. Where was the murder committed?
D. When did the murder occur?
E. Why did the murderer do it?

And the following bonus question(s):

F. Where was Miss Peach at 12:00 AM?
G. Who is motivated by Hatred?

Fill out your final answers in the following format:

A. SUSPECT
B. WEAPON
C. ROOM
D. TIME
E. MOTIVE
F. ROOM
G. SUSPECT

Best of luck, detective.
